content: I was swimming in the river. A huge crocodile came towards me to eat me. I fought it and killed it. It sank into the water.
translations: ita:Stavo nuotando nel fiume. Un enorme coccodrillo venne verso di me per mangiarmi. L'ho combattuto e l'ho ucciso. Affond√≤
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by carlosalberto (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
